        Look for valid wifis
        Parameters:
        currentContext - Current activity, will be used when switching activities
        nextIntent - What the next activity should be (when finding a persistent match)
        macAdresses - List of valid mac addresses
        delay - How often in seconds, you should fetch new wifis
        Returns:
